name: Local City Bus Tour With Hotel (Jeju 3Days)
description: Jeju Island is the perfect get-away destination for travelers to Korea. Jeju is an island shrouded in mystery, culture, and tradition which is best experienced by the wonderful sites you can see during one of our many first class tours. One interesting aspect of Jeju is the geology. Extinct volcanoes abound and there are outcrops visible like almost no where else in the world. You will also me amazed at the variety of cultural displays and performances available.
